div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1134 Cherronesus (near mod. Sevastopol'), 1903 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: c. 50 AR., c. 200 AE Cherronesus: dr. (as BMC 2) hemidr. (as Minns, pl. 4, 18) AE (as BMC 7-8; Minns, pl. 4, 11, 19, 20) (coins with variant types, different magistrates, ctmks.) Disposition: dispersed Bertier de la Garde, ZOOID 26 (1906), pp. 250-76
